summary: This is an internal FBI email chain from November 2020 requesting volunteer agents to assist the Maxwell investigation by showing digital discovery evidence to Ghislaine Maxwell and her defense team at the Metropolitan Detention Center (MDC).

persons.name: Maxwell
persons.context: Ghislaine Maxwell is the subject of the investigation; digital evidence is to be shown to her and her defense team at MDC.

connections.description: Both are FBI agents in the New York office coordinating on the request for assistance for the Maxwell investigation.
II, representing FBI Squad C-20, is involved in the investigation of Maxwell, requesting agent assistance for evidence presentation.

events.title: Digital evidence presentation to Maxwell
events.description: Planned event where volunteer FBI agents would show digital discovery evidence to Ghislaine Maxwell and her defense team at MDC.

keyFacts: FBI Squad C-20 was actively investigating Ghislaine Maxwell as of November 2020.
The investigation involved digital evidence that required presentation to Maxwell and her defense team.
The FBI was seeking volunteer agents to assist with evidence presentation at the Metropolitan Detention Center.
The email chain shows internal FBI coordination for the Maxwell case during her pre-trial detention.
